Original:
我和我的筆記型電腦去了很多咖啡館。作為一名作家，我一直在尋找好地方，不僅可以吃喝，還可以坐下來寫作幾個小時。作為一名教師，我相信根據各種標準進行評分。考慮到這一點，這些是我對此的看法。

食物：****（我吃了雞肉沙拉，還不錯，但是調味太多，雞肉不夠。巧克力布朗尼還不錯，但不是很好。）
飲料： ***** （我嘗試了摩卡拿鐵。好吃！）
價格： ****
提供多種選單選項：***
各種非咖啡飲料選擇：****
英文菜單？不
環境宜人/書寫舒適：****（椅子不能一直移動到桌子上，所以在筆記型電腦上工作不太方便。）
客戶服務： ****
營業時間：上午 10:00 至晚上 8:00 （每週一公休）
附加評論： 咖啡館雖小，但令人愉快。有趣的位置，就在林口老街市場旁邊。
EN:
My laptop and I went to many cafes.As a writer, I have been looking for a good place, not only can I eat and drink, but I can also sit down and write for a few hours.As a teacher, I believe the score is based on various standards.Considering this, these are my opinions on this.

Food: **** (I ate chicken salad, pretty good, but the seasoning is too much, the chicken is not enough. Chocolate Browni is not bad, but it is not very good.)
Drink: ***** (I tried Mocha latte. It was delicious!)
price: ****
Provide multiple menu options: ***
Various non -coffee drinks: ****
English menu?No
Environmental pleasant/comfortable writing: **** (The chair cannot be moved to the table, so it is not convenient to work on a laptop.)
Customer service: ****
Business hours: 10:00 am to 8:00 pm (every Monday is closed)
Additional comments: Although the cafe is small, it is pleasant.Interesting positions are next to Linkou Old Street Market.
